page.title: 01Glentruim and Phones Estates
page.content: The main road from Perth to Inverness runs north-south through this area, with a minor road on the West to Glentruim Estate and one on the East to Phones Estate. Glentruim Estate has a large country house and a caravan site. It is a mixture of heathland and woodland with fir pine mountain ash and birch trees. The river Truim flows alongside the main road. Phones Estate also has a large country house but the land is mostly heath with a few trees. There are two small lochs with several streams.
